title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
steps: Boil pasta in salted water until al dente.
Fry bacon until crispy, then remove from heat.
Whisk eggs with grated Parmesan cheese.
Drain pasta, reserving a bit of cooking water.
Toss pasta with bacon and egg-cheese mixture, adding water if needed.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
steps: Marinate chicken with yogurt, garlic, ginger, and spices for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked through.
Saut√© onions, garlic, and ginger in butter.
Add tomato puree and cream, simmer until thickened.
Add chicken to the sauce and cook for 5 more minutes.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Toasted bread topped with smashed avocado, a sprinkle of salt, and a drizzle of olive oil.
steps: Toast the bread slices to your liking.
Mash the avocado in a bowl and season with salt.
Spread avocado evenly over the toast.
Drizzle with olive oil and optionally add pepper or chili flakes.
Serve immediately.

title: Vegan Buddha Bowl
summary: A colorful bowl of quinoa, roasted veggies, and creamy tahini dressing.
steps: Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Roast a selection of vegetables (e.g., sweet potato, bell peppers, broccoli) with olive oil and salt.
Assemble quinoa in a bowl and top with roasted veggies.
Add chickpeas or tofu for protein if desired.
Drizzle with tahini dressing.
Garnish with seeds or fresh herbs and serve.

title: Blueberry Pancakes
summary: Fluffy pancakes topped with fresh blueberries and maple syrup.
steps: Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl.
In another bowl, whisk milk, eggs, and melted butter.
Combine wet and dry ingredients until smooth.
Fold in fresh blueberries.
Heat a non-stick pan and pour batter to form pancakes.
Cook until bubbles form, flip, and cook the other side.
Serve with maple syrup and extra blueberries.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed in Caesar dressing, topped with parmesan and croutons.
steps: Wash and chop romaine lettuce.
Prepare Caesar dressing (or use store-bought).
Toss lettuce with dressing until coated.
Add croutons and grated Parmesan.
Optionally, top with grilled chicken slices.
Serve chilled.
